ResourceMiner.name: start_workflow
ResourceMiner.description: Initializes the workflow for the ResourceMiner, setting up the initial state and preparing for the first round of actions.

output_updates.name: current_state
output_updates.description: Initial state of the ResourceMiner, e.g., idle, observing, deciding.

ResourceMiner.name: observe_environment
ResourceMiner.description: Observes the current state of the environment, including resource availability and land ownership.

required_variables.name: global_map_state
required_variables.description: Current state of the grid, including resource availability and land ownership.

output_updates.name: observed_state
output_updates.description: Record of the observed environment state.

ResourceMiner.name: decide_investment_strategy
ResourceMiner.description: Decides the investment strategy based on the observed environment state and strategic goals.

required_variables.name: observed_state
required_variables.description: Record of the observed environment state.

output_updates.name: investment_strategy
output_updates.description: Decided investment strategy, including target grid cells and investment amounts.

ResourceMiner.name: process_resolution_outcome
ResourceMiner.description: Processes the outcome of the resolution process and updates the state accordingly.

required_variables.name: winner_id
required_variables.description: Unique identifier for the ResourceMiner who won the contest.

required_variables.name: grid_cell_id
required_variables.description: Unique identifier for the contested or maintained grid cell.

required_variables.name: investment_amount
required_variables.description: Amount of energy invested by the winning miner.

required_variables.name: tie_resolution
required_variables.description: Flag indicating if the outcome was resolved due to a tie.

output_updates.name: current_state
output_updates.description: Updated state of the ResourceMiner based on the resolution outcome.

AdjudicatorAgent.name: initiate_resolution
AdjudicatorAgent.description: Initializes the resolution process for contested land.

output_updates.name: resolution_status
output_updates.description: Status of the resolution process, e.g., initiated, ongoing, completed.

AdjudicatorAgent.name: resolve_investment_outcome
AdjudicatorAgent.condition: Investment data received from ResourceMiner and current grid status
AdjudicatorAgent.description: Resolves the outcome of the investment competition and determines the winner.

required_variables.name: investment_strategy
required_variables.description: Investment strategy submitted by the ResourceMiner, including target grid cells and investment amounts.

output_updates.name: resolution_outcome
output_updates.description: Outcome of the resolution process, including the winner and investment details.
